outcome: Branch B: Ghost Protocol — Citizens believed erased in past BCI purges reappear, now invisible to the system and capable of sabotaging BCI-dependent processes, spreading coordinated resistance to the Council and the restored citizens. Fear and confusion deepen as competing hidden protocols clash.

events.description: Council security receives credible reports that individuals believed purged in March 2023 have reappeared, undetected by the BCI and sabotaging digital terminals at key government offices.

Anonymous messages circulate among citizens, revealing supply caches and encouraging defiance against restored citizen authority. The phrase 'Every erasure leaves a shadow' resurfaces as a rallying cry.
A blackout hits several restored neighborhoods overnight. Ordinary citizens quietly assist the 'ghosts,' helping them evade surveillance and sabotage BCI checkpoints.

Investigation finds Halden’s final unsent directive: a fallback protocol enabling erased citizens to disrupt the BCI if the system lost legitimacy. Council factions debate whether to pursue negotiation or open retaliation.

Restored city officials, desperate to regain control, declare a state of emergency. Street-level standoffs erupt as 'ghost' networks organize citywide protests demanding reform and the right to exist.
